dcterms:creator: L. Zheng
Z. Zhi
Y. Sun
J. Wang
C. Su
S. Wang
Q. Tian
dcterms:description: The MARS dataset is a large-scale video dataset for person re-identification, captured from six near-synchronized cameras on the Tsinghua campus, containing 1,261 different identities and a total of 20,478 tracklets.
dcterms:title: MARS

dcterms:creator: M. Hirzer
C. Beleznai
P. M. Roth
H. Bischof
dcterms:description: The PRID 2011 dataset is collected in several uncrowded outdoor scenes with relatively simple backgrounds and rare occlusions, consisting of image frames captured by two static non-overlapping surveillance cameras.
dcterms:title: PRID 2011

dcterms:creator: T. Wang
S. Gong
X. Zhu
S. Wang
dcterms:description: The ILIDS-VID dataset is captured at an airport arrival hall under a multi-camera CCTV network, consisting of 300 distinct individuals observed in two non-overlapping views, forming 600 pedestrian sequences.
dcterms:title: ILIDS-VID

dcterms:creator: K. Liu
B. Ma
W. Zhang
R. Huang
dcterms:description: The SDU-VID dataset is collected by two non-overlapping camera views in outdoor scenes, containing 600 pedestrian sequences for 300 different identities, with variable lengths of image frames.
dcterms:title: SDU-VID
